detectors.description:
EthicHubDepositManager.setTrustedRelayer(address) (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#1045-1047) should emit an event for: 
	- relayer = _relayer (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#1046)

Ownable.initialize(address).sender (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#707) lacks a zero-check on :
		- _owner = sender (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#708)

Different versions of Solidity are used:
	- Version used: ['0.5.13', '>=0.4.24<0.6.0', '^0.5.0']
	- >=0.4.24<0.6.0 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#4)
	- ^0.5.0 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#68)
	- ^0.5.0 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#145)
	- ^0.5.0 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#414)
	- ^0.5.0 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#445)
	- ^0.5.0 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#686)
	- ^0.5.0 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#768)
	- 0.5.13 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#847)
	- 0.5.13 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#856)
	- 0.5.13 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#895)
	- 0.5.13 (EthicHubDepositManager.sol#941)
